question: What are coverage Effective Dates?
text:
What are coverage Effective Dates? 
          
        
In general, customers who are eligible for a Special Enrollment Period (SEP) after experiencing a Qualifying Life Event can expect coverage to start on the 
1st
 (
first) of the month 
following 
plan selection.

1st
first) of the month 
following 
For example, if a customer selects and enrolls in a plan on April 30, their coverage will take effect on May 1. If a customer selects and enrolls in a plan on May 1, their coverage will 
not 
take effect until June 1, the first of the month following plan selection and enrollment.

not 
Coverage start dates are determined by the enrollment submission date.

During Pennies annual Open Enrollment Period, policy coverage start dates may vary. Coverage start dates for this past years 2022 open enrollment were as follows:



Enroll by December 15, coverage started January 1



Enroll by January 15, coverage started February 1



NOTE: Pennie cannot provide customers with retroactive coverage start dates.
